display_long_description:
# THIS GAME IS A DEMO


# 🌎 THE ULTIMATE GAME IMMERSION
You will experience what FPS campaigns and story telling could be like if you were physically in the game thanks to the mixed reality.

The full freedom of movement will allow you to:
walk through arenas,
collect resources,
scout for best defensive positions,
complete objectives and
fight through ever more challenging and evolving battles.


You will experience fights in the style of in:
guerrilla warfare,
assaults on well defended positions,
stop trains, air transports and ground convoys
sneak & rescue missions among others.


# 🏃 LIFE-SIZE ARENAS IN MIXED REALITY
Best played in large open, safe areas (aim for 7x7m at least ) to enjoy a complete freedom of movement and ultimate immersion. 



# 💖INDEPENDENT REVIEWS
“It elevates an enjoyable and well-executed FPS onto a new level of play” (AR Post)


# 📜 ENGAGING STORY DRIVEN CAMPAIGN
You can see the whole intro video here: https://youtu.be/PyqlRaUlCsk
They came out of nowhere, asked humanity for help. We showed our best nature, just to be betrayed and brought down to our knees. The aliens started hijacking raw material and industrial flows for some kind of mega construction. We call them Jackers. Join the resistance to uncover Jackers' secret plan and to kick them out.


# 🤝WANT MORE?
Join our discord community to get extras and special access: https://discord.gg/9SmkpWbm26
